0bb545059d66ab97d43e43ee85fd3bd52e03e401f020afb0b120f6","dweb:/ipfs/QmfEckWLmZkDDcoWrkEvMWhms66xwTLff9DDhegYpvHo1a"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]}},"version":1}

deploy().details: Creates a store instance owned by msg.sender. Reverts if caller already has a deployed store.

getDeployedStore(address).details: Returns the zero address if no store has been deployed by the specified address

params.who: The address of the store owner to query

returns._0: The IStore instance deployed by the specified address, or zero address if none exists

transferOwnership(address).details: The ownership refers to the address which owned the original deployment      The ownership reffered to here is the mapping not the actual store ownership          The Factory is an easy way of query all stores deployed so it could happen that          The actual ownership of the store hasnt changed hands and its advised          That the owner transfers the store ownership to the owner passed in here

deploy().notice: Deploys a new store contract for the caller

getDeployedStore(address).notice: Retrieves the store contract address deployed by a specific user

documentation.text:
@notice Maps owner addresses to their deployed store contracts
 @dev Zero address indicates no store has been deployed for that address
